pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#flat-data","depth":2,"text":"一维数据/列表数据 "},{"url":"#sequence-data","depth":2,"text":"序列数据 "},{"url":"#hierarchical-data","depth":2,"text":"层级数据 "},{"url":"#compare-data","depth":2,"text":"对比数据 "},{"url":"#relation-data","depth":2,"text":"关系数据 "},{"url":"#statistics-data","depth":2,"text":"统计数据 "}]
pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic 的数据配置既简单又灵活，内置支持",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"列表"}],"、",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"序列"}],"、",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"层级"}],"、",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"对比"}],"、",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"关系"}],"、",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"统计"}],"等结构数据，并预留扩展空间。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"数据类型定义："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"export interface BaseData {
  title?: string;
  desc?: string;
  items?: ItemDatum[];
  illus?: Record<string, string | ResourceConfig>;
  attributes?: Record<string, object>;
  [key: string]: any;
}

export type Data =
  | ListData
  | SequenceData
  | HierarchyData
  | CompareData
  | RelationData
  | StatisticsData;

export type ItemDatum =
  | ListDatum
  | SequenceDatum
  | HierarchyDatum
  | CompareDatum
  | RelationNodeDatum
  | StatisticsDatum;
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Data"}]," 是多种结构数据的联合类型，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"BaseData"}]," 提供标题、描述、数据项列表与插图映射等通用字段；",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ItemDatum"}]," 则是多种数据项的联合类型。完整说明见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#data","children":"Data"}]," 与 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#item-datum","children":"ItemDatum"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"flat-data","children":"一维数据/列表数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"一维数据示例："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 信息图标题
  desc 这是信息图的描述文本
  items
    - icon https://example.com/icon1.svg
      label 数据项 1
      desc 这是数据项 1 的描述
    - icon https://example.com/icon2.svg
      label 数据项 2
      desc 这是数据项 2 的描述
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"sequence-data","children":"序列数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["序列数据强调先后顺序，常用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"sequences"}]," 字段描述："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 迭代流程
  desc 这是一个简单的序列示例
  sequences
    - label 需求评审
    - label 开发实现
    - label 联调测试
  order asc
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"hierarchical-data","children":"层级数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["层级数据可通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"root"}]," 设置根节点，并在节点上用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"children"}]," 递归嵌套："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 信息图标题
  desc 这是信息图的描述文本
  root
    label 一级数据项 1
    children
      - label 二级数据项 1-1
      - label 二级数据项 1-2
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"compare-data","children":"对比数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对比数据强调并列对比，可使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"compares"}],"："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 方案对比
  compares
    - label 方案 A
      value 80
    - label 方案 B
      value 65
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"relation-data","children":"关系数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["关系数据用于描述节点与节点之间的连接关系，使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"nodes"}]," 定义节点，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"relations"}]," 定义连线："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 系统关系
  nodes
    - id api
      label API
    - id db
      label DB
  relations
    - from api
      to db
      direction forward
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["更多关系字段说明见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/infographic-syntax#relation-data","children":"信息图语法"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"statistics-data","children":"统计数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["统计数据通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"values"}]," 提供数值项："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 访问来源占比
  values
    - label 搜索
      value 62
    - label 直达
      value 38
"}]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":[["$r","h4",null,{"id":"数据使用请注意以下事项","children":"数据使用请注意以下事项： "}],["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["结构/数据项未必消费全部字段；缺失必需字段可能影响渲染，使用前请查阅",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-structures","children":"结构"}],"与",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-items","children":"数据项"}],"说明"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"扩展字段需在自定义结构或数据项中手动访问并映射"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["使用资源字段前请阅读",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/resources","children":"资源"}]]}],"
"]}]]}]]}]]
pageProps.tocEn: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#flat-data","depth":2,"text":"One-dimensional Data / List Data "},{"url":"#sequence-data","depth":2,"text":"Sequence Data "},{"url":"#hierarchical-data","depth":2,"text":"Hierarchical Data "},{"url":"#compare-data","depth":2,"text":"Comparison Data "},{"url":"#relation-data","depth":2,"text":"Relation Data "},{"url":"#statistics-data","depth":2,"text":"Statistics Data "}]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic’s data configuration is both simple and flexible, with built-in support for ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"list"}],", ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"sequence"}],", ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"hierarchy"}],", ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"comparison"}],", ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"relation"}],", and ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"statistics"}]," data, with room for extension."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Data type definitions:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"export interface BaseData {
  title?: string;
  desc?: string;
  items?: ItemDatum[];
  illus?: Record<string, string | ResourceConfig>;
  attributes?: Record<string, object>;
  [key: string]: any;
}

export type Data =
  | ListData
  | SequenceData
  | HierarchyData
  | CompareData
  | RelationData
  | StatisticsData;

export type ItemDatum =
  | ListDatum
  | SequenceDatum
  | HierarchyDatum
  | CompareDatum
  | RelationNodeDatum
  | StatisticsDatum;
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Data"}]," is a union of structure-specific data types, while ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"BaseData"}]," provides common fields such as title, description, item list, and illustration map. ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ItemDatum"}]," is a union of multiple item shapes. See ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#data","children":"Data"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#item-datum","children":"ItemDatum"}]," for complete specs."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"flat-data","children":"One-dimensional Data / List Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"One-dimensional data example:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title Infographic Title
  desc This is the description text of the infographic
  items
    - icon https://example.com/icon1.svg
      label Data Item 1
      desc This is the description of data item 1
    - icon https://example.com/icon2.svg
      label Data Item 2
      desc This is the description of data item 2
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"sequence-data","children":"Sequence Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Sequence data emphasizes order and typically uses the ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"sequences"}]," field:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title Iteration Flow
  desc A simple sequence example
  sequences
    - label Requirements Review
    - label Development
    - label Integration Testing
  order asc
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"hierarchical-data","children":"Hierarchical Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Hierarchical data uses ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"root"}]," as the entry node and nests via ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"children"}],":"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title Infographic Title
  desc This is the description text of the infographic
  root
    label Level 1 Item 1
    children
      - label Level 2 Item 1-1
      - label Level 2 Item 1-2
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"compare-data","children":"Comparison Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Comparison data highlights side-by-side differences and uses ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"compares"}],":"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title Plan Comparison
  compares
    - label Plan A
      value 80
    - label Plan B
      value 65
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"relation-data","children":"Relation Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Relation data describes connections between nodes, using ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"nodes"}]," for nodes and ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"relations"}]," for edges:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title System Relations
  nodes
    - id api
      label API
    - id db
      label DB
  relations
    - from api
      to db
      direction forward
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["See ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/infographic-syntax#relation-data","children":"Infographic Syntax"}]," for relation fields."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"statistics-data","children":"Statistics Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Statistics data uses ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"values"}]," for numeric entries:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title Traffic Sources
  values
    - label Search
      value 62
    - label Direct
      value 38
"}]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":[["$r","h4",null,{"id":"please-note-the-following-when-using-data","children":"Please note the following when using data: "}],["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Structures/items may not consume all fields; missing required fields may affect rendering. Please consult ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-structures","children":"structures"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-items","children":"items"}]," documentation before use"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Extended fields need to be manually accessed and mapped in custom structures or items"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Please read ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/resources","children":"Resources"}]," before using resource fields"]}],"
"]}]]}]]}]]
